name: Viral Dusty Dead Identity Quiz
description:
Viral Dusty Dead Identity Quiz

As the stars fail and death stalks the worlds,
who will survive the ravages of dust?

Ever dying, never dead.

Viral Dusty Dead Identity Quiz is a gamelike take on typical viral social personality quizzes of the type seen on Facebook or Buzzfeed. Through making selections in a quiz interface, you are told Which Dusty Dead Character You Are as the quiz itself glitches and decays around you, just like the fragile structures that support your contemporary lifestyle.

dustydead.com

AVAILABLE FREE or pay $5+ for exclusive bonus content!

Download the game for free on Windows, Mac, or Linux -- but for a $5+ donation, you also get the theme song of classic 90's cartoon, "Toon Channel's Dusty Dead Adventures," thought to be lost in the deepest void.
